name: Cooked Chicken Breasts
keywords: bay leaves, celery, chicken breast, onion, peppercorns, thyme, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 whole, skinless, boneless chicken breasts, about 1 pound
1 small sprig thyme or 1/2 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in saucepan. Partly cover and bring to boil. Let simmer 15 minutes. Let stand until ready to use.
